name: Alley Kat
description:
Our very first game ever released! Alley Kat

Make sure you grab this piece of gaming history fast, along with all the gold coins!

"Randomly" generated dark alley streets full of exploding barrels and pallets loaded with dangerous dynamite, all illuminated under the golden glow of street lights, litter this back alley race course full of fast turns and twisting streets.

Run and jump your Neko loving avatar 'Kat', in ever increasing challenges, with 3 Twilight game modes to play.

Timed Run, 5 minutes per level with a 20% speed & 5% control boost on each level. How many coins can you gather before time runs out?  Can you even last 5 minutes?

Gold Run, gather 100 coins to complete these ever faster levels. How fast can you go?

Endless Runner comes with a 10% speed boost every time you press the -M- key!

You get a proportional control boost with every key press, so the controls get 'tighter' as you go faster. How long can you last?

Grid tiles, obstacles and coins are all generated with specific "Random" rules so you'll never play the same game twice! Crazy Ragdoll physics give insanely hilarious death rolls if you slam into obstacles or jump into a garbage dumpster.

3 Graphics modes allow you to take full advantage of the amazing Unreal Engine 4 graphics, or play on even the smallest laptops with a great framerate.

I hope you enjoy my very first (but hopefully not my last) game!

All proceeds from the sale of this game will be used to build combat robots and help fund Team Aquatic Machine Force - S.T.E.M. outreach efforts.
